author: Cynthia Fonderson
contents:
I am a formally trained Biochemist and Data Professional. I began my data journey in 2016 as an undergraduate research fellow at the University of Lethbridge. During my time at the U of L, I investigated the relationship between genetic material and various diseases using computational chemistry and laboratory techniques.
Nowadays, I focus my data analytics and programming tools on solving any problem that comes my way.
Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

contents:
